title: GET_PED_PROP_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX
content:
0xCD420AD1// GetPedPropCollectionLocalIndex
int GET_PED_PROP_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX(Ped ped, int anchorPoint);Parameters:ped: The target pedanchorPoint: One of the anchor points from SET_PED_PROP_INDEXReturns: Local drawable index of the drawable that is currently used in the given ped and component, or -1 if the ped does not have a prop at the specified anchor pointAn analogue to GET_PED_PROP_INDEX that returns collection local prop index (inside GET_PED_PROP_COLLECTION_NAME collection) instead of the global prop index.
codeBlocks:
// GetPedPropCollectionLocalIndex
int GET_PED_PROP_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX(Ped ped, int anchorPoint);
